Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.node

Interface KeyBlockNode

All Superinterfaces:
BlockNode, NodeKeyExtra
public interface KeyBlockNode extends BlockNode, NodeKeyExtra
Describes a block node that is unique in its contents, implements consistent Object.equals(Object) and Object.hashCode() functions, and that can be created on the fly and used as a key.
